tamper_detection.description: A downstream researcher claims to replicate an experiment using 'the same prompt' but actually made a subtle modification. Our protocol's cryptographic prompt hashing detects this immediately.

mlflow.mechanism: No prompt hashing; would need manual text comparison
mlflow.evidence: Prompt text logged as string parameter, no integrity check

wandb.mechanism: No prompt hashing; logged as config value
wandb.evidence: Would require manual diff of logged prompt strings

langsmith.mechanism: Prompt Hub has versioning but no cryptographic verification
langsmith.evidence: Version tracking helps but cannot detect external modifications

differential_diagnosis.description: Two runs on the same abstract produce different outputs. Our protocol identifies which artifact(s) changed by comparing cryptographic hashes, enabling precise root cause analysis.

our_protocol.mechanism: Hash-based differential comparison across 6 artifact types

mlflow.mechanism: Can compare logged parameters but lacks prompt/input/output hashing
mlflow.diagnosis: Would require manual inspection of logged values

wandb.mechanism: Can diff config values but no artifact hashing
wandb.diagnosis: Partial: can compare hyperparameters, cannot verify prompt integrity

langsmith.mechanism: Trace comparison possible but no hash-based verification
langsmith.diagnosis: Can show different traces but cannot isolate which artifact changed

silent_model_update.description: API providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google) periodically update model weights without changing the model name (e.g., 'gpt-4' may point to different checkpoints over time). Our protocol captures system_fingerprint and output hashes to detect such silent updates.
silent_model_update.analysis: GPT-4 exhibited 0 unique system fingerprint(s) across 50 runs, indicating consistent deployment. Local models showed 0 unique weight hash(es) across 0 runs, confirming stable weights.

our_protocol.mechanism: 1) system_fingerprint captured in run record; 2) weights_hash for local models; 3) output_hash divergence signals unexpected changes

mlflow.mechanism: Does not capture system_fingerprint or API response metadata

wandb.mechanism: Logs model name but not provider-side fingerprints

langsmith.mechanism: Captures model name in trace but not system_fingerprint
